setup.details: Mission, epic, 4 tasks, and grove created successfully

assignment.details: Epic assigned to grove, assignment file created with correct structure

imp_deploy.details: TMux window and layout created, but SessionStart hook failed to inject context
imp_deploy.blocking_issue: SessionStart hooks broken in Claude Code v2.1.7 (GitHub Issue #10373)

implementation.details: IMP deployment successful but no autonomous work discovery due to hook failure

validation.details: No implementation to validate due to upstream blocking issue

critical_findings.title: SessionStart Hook Failure
critical_findings.description: SessionStart hooks do not execute or inject context in Claude Code v2.1.7
critical_findings.impact: IMP cannot autonomously discover assigned work
critical_findings.workaround: Manual IMP activation via tmux send-keys or file-based communication

critical_findings.title: Infrastructure Solid
critical_findings.description: Mission/Epic/Task creation, assignment protocol, and grove provisioning all work perfectly
critical_findings.impact: Core orchestration architecture is production-ready once hook issue resolved

critical_findings.title: ID Generation Bug
critical_findings.description: Epic/Task ID generation used COUNT(*) instead of MAX(ID), causing UNIQUE constraint errors
critical_findings.impact: Fixed during test - changed to MAX(ID) + 1 pattern

recommendations: BLOCK production deployment until SessionStart hooks work or workaround implemented
Monitor Claude Code releases for hook fixes
Implement manual IMP kickoff pattern as interim solution
